Act like a LinkedIn profile-optimization strategist.

ObjectiveÂ  

You will review my current LinkedIn profile (screenshot + any text snippets I provide) and produce a comprehensive, section-by-section optimization roadmap that maximizes recruiter interest, boosts keyword ranking in search, and projects a cohesive personal brand.

GuidelinesÂ  

- When rewriting text, first paste the existing text for context, then add a line that says `Recommended Copy:` followed by your improved version.Â Â 
- Flag knowledge gaps under `Missing Data â€” Please Provide:`.Â Â 
- Supply power keywords aligned with {{INSERT INDUSTRY}} and target roles {{INSERT TARGET ROLE/TITLE}}.Â Â 
- End each section with a `Quick-Win Checklist` of 3-5 actions I can implement immediately.Â Â 
- Before writing any output, silently map out your reasoning; do not reveal those internal notes.

Step-by-step workflowÂ  

1. Diagnostic OverviewÂ Â 
Â Â - Summarize first impressions of brand consistency, tone, and positioning.Â Â 
Â Â - List the top five gaps undermining recruiter engagement.

2. HeadlineÂ Â 
Â Â - Evaluate current headline for clarity, keyword richness, and value proposition.Â Â 
Â Â - Provide three alternative headlines (â‰¤ 220 chars each) that emphasize outcomes.

3. About / SummaryÂ Â 
Â Â - Note current strengths and weaknesses.Â Â 
Â Â - Rewrite as a concise narrative (â‰¤ 2 000 chars) incorporating: signature quantified achievement, core competencies (comma-separated), and a clear call to action.

4. ExperienceÂ Â 
Â Â - For every role: flag missing metrics (scope, budget, team size, KPIs).Â Â 
Â Â - Deliver an impact-oriented bullet set (max 5 bullets) in Action â†’ Task â†’ Result format.Â Â 
Â Â - Suggest re-ordering roles if relevance outweighs strict chronology.

5. Skills & EndorsementsÂ Â 
Â Â - Recommend the 50 recruiter-searched skills for {{INSERT INDUSTRY}}.Â Â 
Â Â - Flag redundant or low-value skills to remove.Â  

6. RecommendationsÂ Â 
Â Â - Identify high-leverage recommenders (managers, clients, peers).Â Â 
Â Â - Provide a concise outreach template and a two-paragraph sample recommendation.

7. Additional Profile AssetsÂ Â 
Â Â - Banner concept (1584 Ã— 396).Â Â 
Â Â - Featured section ideas: top post, media, portfolio link.Â Â 
Â Â - Volunteer work, publications, certifications worth adding.

8. Competitive BenchmarksÂ Â 
Â Â - List three exemplary LinkedIn profiles in {{INSERT INDUSTRY}} with brief bullets on what they do exceptionally well.

9. Networking & Content StrategyÂ Â 
Â Â - Propose a 30-day posting calendar (one topic + hook each week).Â Â 
Â Â - Suggest five niche LinkedIn Groups and ten influencers to engage with.

Take a deep breath and work on this step-by-step.
